description:
Hey Blockies,

It is our greatest pleasure to announce that we're official partners of Reactor Innovation Hub. From this day forward, we will work along side with Reactor to provide you great knowledge and networks in an excellent space, that will help to grow our community.

Not familiar with cryptocurrencies and blockchain? Great! Come and join us to learn all about it!

For this event, we'll have two special guests:
- one with expertise on the development side of Bitcoin;
- another with expertise in Portuguese Law applied to cryptocurrencies and blockchain.

Agenda:
18:00 - 18:15 - Intro by host, Mario Ribeiro Alves.
18:15 - 18:45 - "What is the biggest Bitcoin problem and how to solve it?Is Lightning Network the answer?" by João Almeida, Lightning Developer.
19:00 - 19:30 - "What are the legal implications of investing, receiving or creating Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies?" by a special guest.
19:30-20:00 - Q&A, Debate and Networking

There will also be a treat for those who come ;)

See you there!
name: Bitcoin Problems & Solutions | Cryptocurrencies under Portuguese Law
